entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 01 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 01 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early in the evening then changing to periods of snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 01 May 2016
